languages.text: "Ложь есть проступок, что ложится бременем на душу солгавшего. Ложь вышестоящему — преступление против самого Империума, ибо разрушает его благословенную структуру".
"Lying is a transgression that burdens the soul of the one who commits it. Lying to a superior is a crime against the Imperium itself, for it disrupts its blessed structure."
languages.original_text: "Ложь есть проступок, что ложится бременем на душу солгавшего. Ложь вышестоящему — преступление против самого Империума, ибо разрушает его благословенную структуру".

traits.locale_text: "Lying is a transgression that burdens the soul of the one who has committed it. Lying to a superior is a crime against the Imperium itself, for it disrupts its blessed structure."
"Lying is a transgression that burdens the soul of the one who commits it. Lying to a superior is a crime against the Imperium itself, for it disrupts its blessed structure."
"Lying is a transgression that burdens the soul of the one who commits it. Lying to a superior is a crime against the Imperium itself, for it disrupts its blessed structure."

"Lying is a transgression that burdens the soul of the one who commits it. Lying to a superior is a crime against the Imperium itself, for it disrupts its blessed structure."

languages.text: "Die Lüge ist ein Vergehen, das die Seele des Lügenden belastet. Einen Vorgesetzten zu belügen, ist ein Verbrechen gegen das Imperium selbst, da es dessen gesegnete Struktur stört."
languages.original_text: "Lying is a transgression that burdens the soul of the one who commits it. Lying to a superior is a crime against the Imperium itself, for it disrupts its blessed structure."

traits.locale_text: "Die Lüge ist ein Vergehen, das die Seele des Lügenden belastet. Einen Vorgesetzten zu belügen, ist ein Verbrechen gegen das Imperium selbst, da es dessen gesegnete Struktur stört."

languages.text: « Le mensonge est une transgression qui accable l'âme de celui qui la commet. Mentir à un supérieur est un crime à l'encontre de l'Imperium lui-même, car cela perturbe sa structure bénie. »
languages.original_text: "Lying is a transgression that burdens the soul of the one who commits it. Lying to a superior is a crime against the Imperium itself, for it disrupts its blessed structure."

traits.locale_text: « Le mensonge est une transgression qui accable l'âme de celui qui la commet. Mentir à un supérieur est un crime à l'encontre de l'Imperium lui-même, car cela perturbe sa structure bénie. »

languages.text: “说谎是一种罪过，会让说谎者的灵魂不堪重负。向级别更高的人说谎，等同于对帝国本身的犯罪，因为它扰乱了帝国神圣的架构。”
languages.original_text: "Lying is a transgression that burdens the soul of the one who commits it. Lying to a superior is a crime against the Imperium itself, for it disrupts its blessed structure."

traits.locale_text: “说谎是一种罪过，会让说谎者的灵魂不堪重负。向级别更高的人说谎，等同于对帝国本身的犯罪，因为它扰乱了帝国神圣的架构。”

languages.text: «Mentir es una transgresión que pesa sobre el alma de quien la comete. Mentir a un superior es un crimen contra el Imperium, ya que altera su bendita estructura».
languages.original_text: "Lying is a transgression that burdens the soul of the one who commits it. Lying to a superior is a crime against the Imperium itself, for it disrupts its blessed structure."

traits.locale_text: «Mentir es una transgresión que pesa sobre el alma de quien la comete. Mentir a un superior es un crimen contra el Imperium, ya que altera su bendita estructura».

languages.text: 「嘘をつくことは、それを犯した者の魂に重荷を負わせる罪である。上官に嘘をつくことは、帝国そのものに対する罪であり、その祝福された秩序を破壊するものである」
languages.original_text: "Lying is a transgression that burdens the soul of the one who commits it. Lying to a superior is a crime against the Imperium itself, for it disrupts its blessed structure."

traits.locale_text: 「嘘をつくことは、それを犯した者の魂に重荷を負わせる罪である。上官に嘘をつくことは、帝国そのものに対する罪であり、その祝福された秩序を破壊するものである」

languages.text: "Yalan, söyleyenin ruhunu yük altına sokan bir günahtır. Üst makama yalan söylemek ise kutsal düzenini bozduğu için bizzat İmparatorluk'a karşı işlenmiş bir cürümdür."
languages.original_text: "Lying is a transgression that burdens the soul of the one who commits it. Lying to a superior is a crime against the Imperium itself, for it disrupts its blessed structure."

traits.locale_text: "Yalan, söyleyenin ruhunu yük altına sokan bir günahtır. Üst makama yalan söylemek ise kutsal düzenini bozduğu için bizzat İmparatorluk'a karşı işlenmiş bir cürümdür."
